item.title: Progress
item.description: Nearly a decade ago, I lost over 70 lbs through a combination of exercise, eating moderation and keto. In the 7 or 8 years since hitting personal lows around 160lbs, injury and life caught up to me. I’ve not seriously focused on weight loss for quite a few years now – but that changes this year!
